education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

projects.title: Automated Test Suite Development
projects.description: Developed an automated test suite for web applications using Selenium WebDriver and Java. Implemented test scripts for functional testing and regression testing. Achieved 90% test coverage.

projects.title: Integration Testing for E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Conducted integration testing for an e-commerce platform using Selenium and TestNG framework. Identified and reported bugs to the development team for resolution. Ensured the reliability and stability of the application.

projects.title: Cross-browser Compatibility Testing
projects.description: Performed cross-browser compatibility testing for a web application using Selenium Grid. Tested application functionality across multiple browsers and platforms to ensure consistent user experience.
